title: Together [DVD]
creator_credit: 21st Century Hero Film Investment, Big Bang Creative, China Film Group Corporation, Chen Hong, Lee Joo-ik and Chen Kaige
brief_description: Returning to his native China, after the risible reception for his first English language feature, “Killing me softly” Chen Kaige treads on safe ground with this coming of age tale about a prodigious twelve-year-old violinist. Xiao Chun travels to Beijing seeking a place at a prestigious music academy, but after losing (unfairly, as it turns out, due to a lack of connections and payola), Xiao Chun’s father seeks private tuition with a cynical teacher fallen on hard times. Thus starts the journey of Xiao Chun into manhood; his talent grows as does his distraction for a flirtatious, (yet tender), prostitute who lives nearby. Introduced to the notions of love, honesty, deception and betrayal, Xiao Chun must soon choose between his gauche but loving country-bumpkin father and a cultured but soulless life in the city. Also available on VHS [318952].
